tidycmprsk 0.0.0.9000

Competing Risks Cumulative Incidence

cuminc.Rd

Competing Risks Cumulative Incidence

# S3 method for formula
cuminc(formula, data, strata, rho = 0, ...)

cuminc(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
cuminc(x, ...)

Arguments

formula

formula with Surv() on LHS and covariates on RHS.
data

data frame
strata

stratification variable. Has no effect on estimates. Tests will be stratified on this variable. (all data in 1 stratum, if missing)
rho

Power of the weight function used in the tests.
...

passed to methods
x

input object

Value

tidycuminc object

Examples

# calculate risk for entire cohort -----------
cuminc(Surv(ttdeath, death_cr) ~ 1, trial)

#> 
#> ── cuminc() ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> Estimates and Variances:
#> $est
#>         5    10   15    20
#> 1 1 0.000 0.030 0.12 0.215
#> 1 2 0.005 0.025 0.09 0.205
#> 
#> $var
#>           5           10           15           20
#> 1 1 0.0e+00 0.0001462496 0.0005310113 0.0008494634
#> 1 2 2.5e-05 0.0001225043 0.0004117860 0.0008202605
#> 

# calculate risk by treatment group ----------
cuminc(Surv(ttdeath, death_cr) ~ trt, trial)

#> 
#> ── cuminc() ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> Tests:
#>           stat pv df
#> 1 1.560312e-32  1  1
#> 2 1.797470e-33  1  1
#> Estimates and Variances:
#> $est
#>         5    10   15    20
#> 0 1 0.000 0.030 0.12 0.215
#> 1 1 0.000 0.030 0.12 0.215
#> 0 2 0.005 0.025 0.09 0.205
#> 1 2 0.005 0.025 0.09 0.205
#> 
#> $var
#>           5           10           15           20
#> 0 1 0.0e+00 0.0001462496 0.0005310113 0.0008494634
#> 1 1 0.0e+00 0.0001462496 0.0005310113 0.0008494634
#> 0 2 2.5e-05 0.0001225043 0.0004117860 0.0008202605
#> 1 2 2.5e-05 0.0001225043 0.0004117860 0.0008202605
#>
